name: Xandeum SOL
description: Xandeum offers storage-enabled liquid staking and is the first pool to programmatically share block rewards with stakers. Additionally, once the Xandeum storage layer is integrated into Solana, stakers will earn part of the fees of each and every storage transaction in the Solana ecosystem. This is future-proof staking and evolving the Solana ecosystem landscape to empower web2 apps to be ported to web3.
